docs.snippet: Reversing a plan the president-elect had assailed, the company will keep roughly half of the 2,000 manufacturing jobs in Indiana that it was to shift to Mexico....
docs.lead_paragraph: Reversing a plan the president-elect had assailed, the company will keep roughly half of the 2,000 manufacturing jobs in Indiana that it was to shift to Mexico.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump plans to travel to Carrier air-conditioner plant in Indiana to announce deal with company to keep roughly 1,000 jobs in state, rather than shipping them to Mexico; move is likely to hearten Trump's followers in Rust Belt states and to signal his willingness and ability to take on big business.

headline.main: Trump to Announce Carrier Plant Will Keep Jobs in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Trump Takes On a Big Business, and 1,000 Jobs Stay in Indiana
